text: mema sanshodhanaya heta (19 da) parlimenthuwata idiripath kirimata siyalu katayuthu sudanam kara thibunada janadhipathiwaraya wisin parlimenthu sasiya kal thabu nisa eya mayi masa dakwa pramada wana bawada manthriwaraya pawasa thibuna.
ehema nathuwa issara ape rate apita purudu wela hiti sundara alpechchja gahaniyawa aapahu genna kagewath adahasak na
eya mangahara hara iddi mama thamayi eyata kiyanne wada karanna kiyala.

ikshutapalaya edawas rathrinaye awamen kal athiwa aahara piliyelakota arunata palamuwen dawati dandu ha muwa dowuna pan di udaya uksakuru ha samaga aahara walandawa walanda ikbithi anumeweni bana wadara wadana unwahanselata, “mage kotasa wanneya”yi kiya eka eka uk danda bagin pujakota pasugaman pinisa unwahansela ha samaga magata basa mada thanak gos walaki sitine
gihilla thaman kala de pilibadawa adahas palakaranna kawuruwath pakilenna oone naha.
me athara thaniya ta hirihara kirima gana ikmanin prathichara nodakwima pilibandawa dilli polisiyata chodana ella wi atha.
atham thanaka peretha thatuwak men buddha pujawa da pawathwanu pene.
likhithawa paksha gananawak wyawasthadayaka sampadaka mandalayata thamange mulika adahasa labadi thibenawa.

anek disthrikkawala men badulla manapa satan nathi bawa asannata labimath sathutak yayi pawasu janadhipathiwaraya thama me paniwidaya denne rate siyalu denage dana ganima pinisa bawath kiwe ya.rate anagathaya thiranaya kerena me mohothe ratata awashya katha kara kara inna parlimenthuwak nowa wadak kala haki shakthimath parlimenthuwak bawath janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kele ya.me rate daruwange anagathaya randi pawathinne rate aarthikaya shakthimath kirima matha bawa prakasha kala janadhipathiwaraya adata wada yahapath jiwana thaththwayak janathawa wenuwen heta dawase uruma kara dennata thama sathu wagakima akuratama itu karana bawath kiwe ya.eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye badulla disthrik kandayam nayaka , amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha athulu apekshakayo da mehidi adahas dak wu athara hitapu kathanayaka wijamu lokubandara mahatha athulu pirisak da raliyata ekwuha.
ee dawas wala wijayanthi ta kollekuth hitiyalu.
eseth nathinam sapa sampath windinnata man peth wiwara karagannawada?
namuth eya aluth kirimedi bohowita nawa kadpatha thapalen gedarata ewana eka thamayi wenne.
me upadeshanayehi thawath yati aruthak thibe.
mama mage birinndage wishwasaya dinagaththa awanka, akalanka, nikalal, supeshalakami, bodhisathwa gunopetha charithawath porak.
inpasu, kisiseth ma ape kandayamata nogalapena walas mama eyata ek kale ayi dayi fesbukayiyagen asamin mama ehi prathicharayak yeduwemi.
bukar sammanayata nirdeshitha digu layisthuwe kruthi atharata paminima pawa lekhanayedi kalayuthu dewal atharedi apita kalayak ha awakashayak labadimak wage.

saba shubharanchiya thawamath nodana sitina aya saba jiwithaya laba ganimata ha sadakalika duk walin midima udesa api yachnya kala yuthu noweda?

harthalaya aarambha kala, eya pawathwa gena giya deshapalana nayakathwaya wisinma, ema harthalaya nawatha dama atharamanga samadanaye mawatha thora ganima; adhirajyawadihu, yatath wijithawala pana nangi thibunu nidahas aragala mada pawathwime upaya margaya lesa, nawa yatath wijitha athi kirime ki්rayawaliyaka niratha wi siti awadhiyaka mema nagitima siduwima; harthalaya meheyawu deshapalana nayakathwaya rajaye deshapalana nayakathwaya samanga pawathi samipa panthimaya, pawul saha sanskruthika sambandhakam me atharen wadagath eewa lesa salakiya hakiyi.

eya thamayi uthura saha nagenahira ekathu kirima, dewani karanaya apage idamwalata sambandhayi.
anek athata,prajathanthrawadaya yanu shuddha wu wachanayak nowethath `awakashayan hakileddi` wamataya dakunataya kiya wargikaranayak natha.

wadath pulul katha themawak thuladi sarthaka thira rachanayak sandaha awasi tharam amudrawya thibunath , siyum katha themawak thuladi sarthaka thira rachanayak goda nagima wadath aayasayakin kala yuthu karthawyayaki , samanya thathwayan yatathe kisidu harayak nodakina katha themawak gab samanala sandhawaniya aasawen rasawindina sinama nirmanayak wima nisawen thirachanayada suwishesha sarthakathwayak ath karagaththakya yanna mage wishwasayayi samastha sinama rasawindanaya salakimedi samanala sandhawaniya ma matha yugayedi rasawindi hondama sinama pataya lesa nam kirimata kamathi athara udyanaye karadara karayange charitha dekath , tharunayage sohoyurage charithayak adhiranganayen baharawa wadath thathwika wuwa nam anagi bawada , janapriya sangithagnyayekuge prasangayaka dawantha bhawaya ismathu wena aakarayen awasan/ aarambhaka sangitha prasangaya rupayata naguwa nam wadath ihala rasawindanayak labadimata hakiyawa thibu bawada sandahan kala yuthuya .

gaman karana dumriya polgahawela dumriya sthanayen tharamak idiriyata wegayen gaman karamin thibuni.kalabalayata pathwu ma dumriye hadisi damwala adina lesa ee asala siti ayata ka gasa kiyumuth ekwarama siduwi aththe kumakdayi nodanna owun uda bima balamin sitiyeya.kisiwekuth damwala noadda nisa gamankarana dumriyen bimata pana wegayen nawatha dumriya sthanaya wetha diwagiyeya.ee athara kisiweku ho wisin damwala adima nisa siyalu dumriya magin kalabalayata path karamin dumriya atharamaga nawathwiya.

pahala malwathu oya wyapruthiye wyapruthi yojanawa anuwa jalaya ras kirima sadaha kappachachi awata pradeshaye akkara dahath dahasaka wananthara saha awashesha kala idam yata kirimata siduwei.meyata amatharawa wilpaththu jathika wanodyanaye eemamaira ’daba * aarakshitha kalapaye akkara dedahasak palathuru waga kirima sadaha pudgalayanta ho aayathana wetha pawara dimata mema wyapruthiyen salasumi kara athi athara nawatha padinchi kirimi sadaha thanthirimale ha chendi kulam margayen batahira desata wannata wilpaththu jathika wanodyanaye awashesha kala akkara hayasiya haththa pahak kapa damimata yojana kara atha.

2006.04.15 dina niyojya nagaradhipathi washayen pathwima ha ema wakawanuwa thula sita me dakwa athigaru janadhipathithumage janadhipathi mathiwaraya, palath sabha mathiwaranaya saha parlimenthu maha mathiwaranayedi athigaru janadhipathithuma pramukha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye ha podujana eksath peramune jayagrahanaya wenuwen saha apa rajaya wenuwen mulikathwaya gena katayuthu kirima.

sinhala katha karana pa්rajawan thula demala bhashawa igenima pa්rawardhanaya kirima, demala bhashawa katha karana pa්rajawan thula sinhala bhashawa igena ganima pa්rawardhanaya kirima saha inga්risi bhashawa siyalu pa්rajawan athara sambandhikarana bhashawa lesa pa්rawardhanaya kirima sandaha thraibhasha pa්rathipaththiya balathmaka kirima sandaha wu uthsahayan shakthimath kirima.

kathandara blog eka gana danwim!: 2010 la kaha pata, la nil pata, la rathu pata thith watichcha sudu sari issara man kal marapu wadapole kantha pakshaye -bawalath- udawiya thaman ge amma hari, thaththa hari wage pawule kenek miya gihin niwaduwen passe wadata enne sudu sariyak andagena.eda indan sathi deka thunak onna sudu sari andinawa.eeta passe, sudu sariye podi kalu thith watichcha, ehemath naththan loku kalu thith watichcha sari ehema andinna patan gannawa.thawath sathi deka thunak yanakota onna la kaha pata, la nil pata, la rathu pata thith watichcha sudu sariwalata bahinawa.thawath sathi deka thunak withara yanakota onna la kaha pata, la nil pata, la rathu pata sariwalata bahinawa.
kese wethath ihatha sandahan karana lada siyaluma motar ratha madili ekama samagamak wisin nipadawana eewa bawa oba dannawada?
